elements: I have benefited from exercise. [Use this with four Vitality to gain more Health.]
I must devote my energies to this..
Am I ready to grow stronger?
Am I ready to grow stronger?
You might not know it to look at me, but I have grown strong as a smith or a soldier.
I must devote my energies to this.
Shall I grow stronger yet?[Use this with six Vitality to gain more Health.]
There are many things now that I could crush in my fists.
I must devote my energies to this.
If I know the right Lore, I can employ the invisible arts to reach an even higher summit. I must choose between strength and grace.
Could I grow healthier still? [Use this with eight Vitality to gain more Health.]
I move like a mountain and strike like the sky. 'To master others is strength. To master yourself is power.' [Health and Skill can increase no further.]
I must devote my energies to this.
Machine perfection. Sinew-bound ivory, tight in satin skin. 'From here, I can only deteriorate.' [Health and Skill can increase no further.]
I must devote my energies to this.
I am flush with clever quotations. [Use this with four Erudition to gain more Reason.]
Shall I stock my mind with more knowledge?

Shall I stock my mind with more knowledge?
I have learnt enough to know how little I know. [Use this with six Erudition to gain more Reason.]
My skull creaks at the corners with the knowledge I've accrued. [Use this with eight Erudition to gain more Reason.]
Can I sharpen my reason further?
